tests.name: Flight Closeness
tests.setup: mkdir -p __autograding/Flight_Closeness_ ; ls testSuite/multi | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/referencePandora.jar -o closeFlight fileName &>> __autograding/Flight_Closeness_/expected ; ls testSuite/multi | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/pandora.jar -o closeFlight fileName &>>  __autograding/Flight_Closeness_/output

tests.name: Flight Closeness (Same origin)
tests.setup: mkdir -p __autograding/Flight_Closeness_(Same_origin) ; ls testSuite/multi | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/referencePandora.jar -o closeFlightSameOri fileName &>> __autograding/Flight_Closeness_(Same_origin)/expected ; ls testSuite/multi | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/pandora.jar -o closeFlightSameOri fileName &>>  __autograding/Flight_Closeness_(Same_origin)/output

tests.name: Flight Closeness (Different origin)
tests.setup: mkdir -p __autograding/Flight_Closeness_(Different_origin) ; ls testSuite/multi | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/referencePandora.jar -o closeFlightDiffOri fileName &>> __autograding/Flight_Closeness_(Different_origin)/expected ; ls testSuite/multi | xargs -I fileName java -jar target/pandora.jar -o closeFlightDiffOri fileName &>>  __autograding/Flight_Closeness_(Different_origin)/output
